```{r}


bases <- read_excel("raw-data/bases.xlsx") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  group_by(country_territory_name) %>% 
  count()

bases$country_territory_name <- tolower(bases$country_territory_name)

literacy <- read_excel("raw-data/literacy.xls", 
                       skip = 2) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(-indicator_name, -indicator_code)

literacy <- literacy %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("x"),
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "literacy_rate",
    names_prefix = "x")


births <- read_excel("raw-data/births.xls", 
                     skip = 2) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(-indicator_name, -indicator_code)

births <- births %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("x"),
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "birth_rate",
    names_prefix = "x")


deaths <- read_excel("raw-data/deaths.xls",
                     skip = 2) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(-indicator_name, -indicator_code)

deaths <- deaths %>% 
  pivot_longer(
   cols =  starts_with("x"),
    names_to = "year",
   values_to = "death_rate",
   names_prefix = "x")


```
